Title: Nyanpire The Animation
Description: ['A heartwarming story about a stray black cat, who was given blood from a vampire. He was taken in by a girl called Misaki and started to live with her. Nyanpire\'s favorite phrase is "Give me blood nya."']
Voices: ['Koshimizu, Ami', 'Fukuyama, Jun', 'Sugiyama, Noriaki', 'Gotou, Yuuko', 'Hirota, Shion', 'Tachibana, Shinnosuke', 'Hirota, Shion', 'Maeda, Nozomi', 'Maeda, Nozomi']
